greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1-x)/(1+x+2*x^2).
comment: INVERTi transform of A005408, (2n + 1) = A078050 signed: (1, 2, 0, -4, -4, 4, 12, 4, -20, -28,...) = left border of triangle A144106. [From _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 11 2008]
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1,-2).
formula: a(n-1) = sum(k=1..n, (sum(i=0..n, binomial(k,n-i) * binomial(k+i-1,2*k-1))) * (-1)^(n-k)). [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Mar 11 2013]
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2002
